Why work for Gloucester City Council?

At Gloucester City Council, you'll be part of a team dedicated to making a real difference to the lives of over 130,000 residents. Every role contributes to transforming our historic city into a thriving, sustainable community.

Make an impact every day

Whether you're collecting bins, supporting vulnerable families, shaping planning policy, or managing our parks, your work directly improves the quality of life in Gloucester.

Working at Gloucester City Council

We're a forward-thinking council serving a vibrant, historic city. Our vision is a Gloucester that works for everyone ‚Äî inclusive, thriving, and future-ready. We're investing in regeneration, tackling climate change, and supporting our most vulnerable residents.

Career areas

We offer over 800 different types of roles across a wide range of services:

Environmental Services

Waste collection, street cleansing, parks and green spaces

Planning and Development

Planning, building control, regeneration, economic growth

Housing and Communities

Housing, homelessness, community development, grants

Corporate Services

HR, finance, IT, customer services, legal, communications

Regulatory Services

Licensing, environmental health, community safety

Culture and Leisure

Museums, tourism, events, sports facilities
